entities.name: draco
entities.description: Draco is mentioned as someone Harry doesn't take orders from.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character and is being threatened by Crabbe.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as shouting for Harry from another room.

entities.name: crabbe
entities.description: Crabbe is the one who casts a curse at Harry and is restrained by Malfoy.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is trying to restrain Crabbe from killing Harry.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as casting a Stunning Spell at Crabbe's head.

relationships.description: Crabbe casts a curse at Harry, but it misses him.
Malfoy tries to restrain Crabbe from killing Harry.
Hermione casts a Stunning Spell at Crabbe's head, but it misses because Malfoy pulls him out of the way.
